Text: Patagonia contactRichard My contacts at Patagonia are Rich Costello facilities Christie Kelley director of retail Jil Zilligen VP of environmental programs I have worked mostly with Christie and Rich on operational and budget issues I have met with Jil once Her attitude seemed to be havent we already taken care of electricity Aaron Klemm Enron Energy Services pager Fax

RE palm springs Cc I am not sure I will check into it Original Message From ES On Behalf Of Sent Thursday October AM To Klemm Aaron Subject RE palm springs Aaron did your web folks run this by our legal and PR group C Original Message From Klemm Aaron at INTERNET Sent Wednesday October PM To CHRISTIEKELLY Subject FW palm springs Christie Here are some of the press releases concerning the operational date of the wind facility mentioned in your contract Original Message From Richard ES Sent Tuesday October PM To Klemm Aaron Subject FW palm springs Aaron Here is the information that you requested on the Palm Springs facilities Let me know if you have any questions Regards Richard Original Message From Bolton Stacey Sent Tuesday October PM To Ring Richard Subject palm springs NEWSROOMcasestudiesgphtml NEWSROOMcasestudiesgphtml anabnrgif Nature Bkgrdjpg

REI am swamped today Original Message From Richard ES Sent Wednesday October PM To Klemm Aaron Subject RE When do you think that we could set up some time to meet via telephone call with Patagonia I do not know if it is possible to do it yet today or not What do you think Original Message From Klemm Aaron Sent Wednesday October PM To Ring Richard Subject RE I dont know but it is small Monthly bills in the range of under dollars a month Original Message From Richard ES Sent Wednesday October PM To Klemm Aaron Subject FW Aaron Are you available today What is the approximate annual load associated with the additional facilities of Patagonia Original Message From Mainzer Elliot Sent Wednesday October PM To Ring Richard Subject RE How about PST today Original Message From Ring Richard Sent Wednesday October AM To Mainzer Elliot Subject FW Elliot When would you like to contact Patagonia Original Message From Klemm Aaron Sent Wednesday October AM To Ring Richard Subject RE I can be there to introduce and then drop out Patagonia is in Ventura CA Original Message From Richard ES Sent Wednesday October AM To Klemm Aaron Subject RE Do you want to be involved in the discussion with Patagonia Where are Patagonias offices Original Message From Klemm Aaron Sent Wednesday October AM To Ring Richard Subject RE Yes thank you Original Message From Richard ES Sent Wednesday October AM To Klemm Aaron Subject RE Aaron Did you receive the link to the Enron Wind Company site with the article regarding the Palm Springs project Original Message From Klemm Aaron Sent Wednesday October AM To Ring Richard Subject RE I would call Jil and Christie as they are the respective decision makers for the environmental and business sides of the coin Original Message From Richard ES Sent Tuesday October PM To Klemm Aaron Subject Aaron Which of the individuals do you suggest that we speak to at Patagonia first Rich Costello Christie Kelley or Jil Zilligen Thanks Richard

RE Fetzer Vineyards and renewable power Cc Lamar Fetzer spends about per year on electricity Natural Gas is negligble about therms annually Fetzer is an organic farm and winery Original Message From FrazierLamar Sent Sunday September PM To Klemm Aaron Cc Riley Tom Subject Re Fetzer Vineyards and renewable power Aaron Could you provide me with the monthly spend for both gas and electric on this account I am assuming you have the gas spend We will make a determination from there Dick I know you have been trying to reach me about the other renewable opportunity we discussed a couple of weeks ago however I just dont have the resources at this time to work that opportunity Please feel free to work the opportunity with your contact in Portland I apologize for the delayed response Aaron please get back to me with whatever information you may have on Fetzer Regards Lamar From Aaron KlemmWestern RegionThe Bentley xchange on PM To Lamar ES cc Tom RileyWestern RegionThe Bentley xchange xchange Subject Fetzer Vineyards and renewable power Richard and Lamar Fetzer emailed me recently and wants to begin discussions on extending their fixed price renewable power deal with us Their current fixed price expires in with and index price going out to If this is below your radar Lamar I would be happy to work it with the customer and Richard on the renewable energy side Aaron Klemm Service Management

Fetzer Vineyards and renewable power Cc Richard and Lamar Fetzer emailed me recently and wants to begin discussions on extending their fixed price renewable power deal with us Their current fixed price expires in with and index price going out to If this is below your radar Lamar I would be happy to work it with the customer and Richard on the renewable energy side Aaron Klemm Service Management

FW CTCs and collars after rolloffJeff What would be your interpretation of CTC rolloff as contemplated in our contracts and what actually happened to CTCs in California Original Message From SmithMike Sent Wednesday November AM To Klemm Aaron Subject RE CTCs and collars after rolloff It dont think it has You might check with Dasovichhe will have a much better view MDS From Aaron KlemmWestern RegionThe Bentley xchange on PM To Mike D ES cc Subject RE CTCs and collars after rolloff Mike I received a customer inquiry related to CTC rolloff and their pricing The contracts are a percent off of frozen tariff before CTC rolloff and a collar after What is the legal interpretation of CTC rolloff and has that occurred in the cases of these contracts Original Message From SmithMike Sent Tuesday November PM To Klemm Aaron Subject CTCs and collars after rolloff Please let me know what you want to do here and why Thanks Forwarded by Mike D SmithHOUEES on PM Elizabeth Wright PM To Mike D ES cc Subject CTCs and collars after rolloff Mike I would be happy to do this for Aaron but I wanted to check with you and see if it is something that you want me to be doing or if it should go to someone whos already worked with these contracts Thanks Elizabeth Forwarded by Elizabeth WrightHOUEES on PM From Aaron KlemmWestern RegionThe Bentley xchange on PM To Elizabeth ES cc Timothy C ES Kyle LarsonWestern RegionThe Bentley xchange Tom RileyWestern RegionThe Bentley xchange Kevin ES Subject CTCs and collars after rolloff Elizabeth Would you please review the contracts for Gart Sports Brinker Gilbert Martin for the pricing provision that when CTCs end they move to a collar pricing I have a customer inquiring about this contractual distinction Thanks Aaron Klemm Service Management
